content.rendered:
Directed by Tim Burton. James Marshall. Gandja Monteiro.

Written by Charles Addams. Alfred Gough. Alfred Gough. Miles Millar. Miles Millar. Kayla Alpert. April Blair. Matt Lambert.

Cast Hunter Doohan( Tyler Galpin ) . Percy Hynes White( Xavier Thorpe ) . Emma Myers( Enid Sinclair ) . Joy Sunday( Bianca Barclay ) . Georgie Farmer( Ajax Petropolus ) . Christina Ricci( Marilyn Thornhill ) . Victor Dorobantu( Thing ) . Gwendoline Christie( Principal Larissa Weems ) . Riki Lindhome( Dr. Valerie Kinbott ) . Jamie McShane( Sheriff Donovan Galpin ) . Naomi J. Ogawa( Yoko Tanaka ) . Johnna Dias-Watson( Divina ) . Oliver Watson( Kent ) . Moosa Mostafa( Eugene Ottinger ) . Luyanda Unati Lewis-Nyawo( Deputy Ritchie Santiago ) . Daniel Himschoot( Hyde Monster ) . Iman Marson( Lucas ) . Calum Ross( Rowan Laslow ) . Cezar Grumazescu( Coach Vlad ) . George Burcea( Lurch ) . Morgan Beale( Jonah ) . Tommie Earl Jenkins( Mayor Noble Walker ) . Islam Bouakkaz( Carter ) . Catherine Zeta-Jones( Morticia Addams ) . Luis GuzmÃ¡n( Gomez Addams ) . Isaac Ordonez( Pugsley Addams ) . William Houston( Joseph Crackstone ) . Rina Mahoney( Janet Ottinger ) . Karina Varadi( Wednesday (6y) ) . Georgia Goodman( Sue Ottinger ) . Murray McArthur( Fabian ) . Fred Armisen( Uncle Fester ) . Olimpia Malai( The Minister ) . Nitin Ganatra( Dr. Anwar ) . Lucius Hoyos( Young Gomez ) . Max Pemberton( Dalton ) . Cheherezade Valentine Okotaka Ebale( Lou-Anne Walker ) . Oliver Wickham( Young Larissa Weems ) . James Clay( Ethan Hanson (Hiker) ) . Edward Kennedy( MC Blood Suckaz ) . Ismail Kesu( Young Sheriff Walker ) . Caroline Lawrie( Martha ) . Lachele Carl( Agnes ) . Lisa O’Hare( Arlene ) . Gwen Jones( Young Morticia Addams ) . Sophia Nomvete( Connie Jorgensen ) . IchirÃ´ YÃ»ki( Kenichi Tanaka ) . Amanda Drew( Esther Sinclair ) . Ryan Ellsworth( Murray Sinclair ) . Gloria Garcia( Goody’s Mom ) . Simon Furness( Grumpy Farmer ) . Gracy Goldman( Gabrielle ) . Lewis Hayes( Garett Gates ) . Philip Rosch( Ansel Gates ) . Ben Wilson( Young Deputy Galpin ) . Horia Bazavan( Nevermore Student (uncredited) ) . Chloe Cate( Student (uncredited) ) . Anees Mohamed( Kid (uncredited) )

Language English.

Producers Kayla Alpert. Gail Berman. Tim Burton. Jonathan Glickman. Carla GonzÃ¡lez Vargas. Alfred Gough. Tommy Harper. Nick Iannelli. Kevin Lafferty. Miles Millar. David Minkowski. Kevin Miserocchi. Andrew Mittman. Carmen Pepelea. Steve Stark. Natalie Testa. Todd Williams.

Production MGM Television. Millar Gough Ink. Tee and Charles Addams Foundation.

Creator Alfred Gough(series created by). Miles Millar(series created by).

Number of Seasons 2

Number of Episodes 9

Status OnGoing (2022–)
